nodes.text: The Blood Brother, formerly known as the Dura-Khan III, was a heavily modified Consular III-class cruiser used by Reddjak, and the main command vessel for the Red Fury Brotherhood.

Originally known as the Dura-Khan III, the Blood Brother was a Galactic Republic diplomatic vessel that was commandeered by Reddjak the pirate. Like other diplomatic vessels, the ship was painted red to denote its status of neutrality. After Reddjak claimed the ship, he kept the color scheme.
